p: The animals were allotted to the three dietary treatments in a replicated 3 Ã— 3 Latin square design with 3 periods. Each period lasted for 20 days. Based on the published results of stevioside and the test results of stevioside in goats by our group, goats were divided into three groups (S0, S400, and S800) to be, respectively, fed a diet with 0, 400, and 800 mg stevioside per kg forage on a dry matter (DM) basis. Goats were fed a diet containing concentrate and forage twice daily. The ingredients and chemical composition of the basal diet are shown in Table 1.
